articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ro Myong Gun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Ro Myong Gun 
   Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of Ro Myong Gun, member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and former department director of the C.C., the WPK, Friday, expressing deep condolences over his death.
